value.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organization’s data.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Manage Azure AD Identity Protection
value.excerpt: Manage Azure AD Identity Protection

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of webhooks when you trigger an Azure function with a GitHub webhook and parse the payload for insights.

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Plan, implement, and administer conditional access
value.excerpt: Plan, implement, and administer conditional access

value.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

value.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API
value.excerpt: By using the Azure Cosmos DB Table API, you will benefit from the low latency, high availability, and scalability of Azure Cosmos DB in a Table storage application.

value.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
value.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
value.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.excerpt: Alex Frankel (@sonofdiesel) joins Scott Hanselman (@shanselman) to discuss Azure Blueprints. Environment creation can be a long and error prone process. Azure Blueprints helps you deploy and update cloud environments in a repeatable manner using composable artifacts such as policies, role-based access

value.excerpt: Byron Tardif joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure App Service Web Apps, the best way to build and host web applications in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure. value.excerpt: Shubha Vijayasarathy joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Event Hubs, which makes data ingestion simple, secure, and scalable.
